title: Did Section 54 of the Obama Care Program come into force in May 2018?
subtitle: Mimi announces that "art. Of Obama's care, 30 per cent of social security payments for older persons will be taken to cover insurance for undocumented migrants.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Article 54 of the Programme for the Welfare of Older Persons stipulates that 30 per cent of social security payments for older persons are "transferred" to pay insurance to undocumented migrants as of 1 May 2018.
